message.content:
cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.RO, cs.SE, cs.CY

This paper discusses the use of simulation environments in the industrial context for evaluating solution approaches for industrial communication networks. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). Additionally, the paper also discusses the rising complexity of automation tasks, which falls under the category of cs.SY (Systems and Control). The use of simulation tools also relates to the category of cs.RO (Robotics). The paper also discusses the need for cost-, resource- and time-efficient evaluation of solution approaches, which falls under the category of cs.SE (Software Engineering). Finally, the paper discusses the mapping of available simulation and emulation tools onto the requirements of industrial applications, which falls under the category of cs.CY (Computers and Society).
